name: 初遇
content: 我是槲寄生，很高兴认识你。#0|……你说看不出我很高兴？#4.5|呵……那么现在呢？#6.7
encontent: I am Druvis III. It's my pleasure to meet you.#0| ... You said I didn't look very pleased?#4.3| Hah ... How about now? #7.8

name: 箱中气候
content: 水从泥土里去往天上，又从天上坠落地面。#0|如同我从林中来，又向林中去。#6.6
encontent: Water travels from the ground to the sky, and then falls back;#0| just as I, who come from the forest, and now go back.#4.6

name: 致未来
content: 或许，在工业之梦结束的那日。#0|没有人再会伐尽茂密的林海。#3.2|我期待着那一天。#6.8
encontent: Perhaps when the dream of industrial society is realized,#0|no one will ever cut down the dense forest.#3.4| I am looking forward to that day.#6.4

name: 孑立
content: ……您也在聆听窗外树梢间的风声吗？#0
encontent: ... Are you also listening to the wind dancing on the treetops?#0

name: 问候
content: 你带来了一缕原野的风。#0
encontent: You brought me a gentle breeze on the field.#0

name: 朝晨
content: 太阳升起，野兽们噤声不吠。#0|而后，我听见第一只离林之鸟振翅的声响。#4.8
encontent: When the sun rose, the beasts kept silence.#0| Then, I heard a bird flapping its wings. It's the first to leave the forest.#4.9

name: 信任-朝晨
content: 如果更晚、更怠惰，您就看不到那样美丽的日出了，#0|没有关系吗？#5.4
encontent: If you are lazier and get up even later, you won't see such a beautiful sunrise.#0 | ... Does it matter?#6.3

name: 夜暮
content: 时代的潮水不断起落，正如日夜更迭流转，永无止息。#0
encontent: Tides of time rise and fall. Days and nights switch and whirl. The infinite loop will never come to an end.#0|

name: 信任-夜暮
content: 夜幕降临了，野兽嘶鸣，夜枭呜咽。#0|它们的脚步踏在大地上，如同树木的根须扎入泥土中。#5.2
encontent: The night falls. The beasts howl. The owls sob.#0| Their feet treading on the ground are just like the roots embedded into the soil.#6

name: 帽檐与发鬓
content: 绿色的眼睛遗传自我的母亲。#0|虽然我没有如她所愿地成为上流社会的淑女，#3.6|但是我感谢母亲留给我的一切。#11.2
encontent: The green eyes are inherited from my mother.#0| Although I did not grow into a lady of the upper class as she wished ...#4.5| ... I thank my mother for everything she left.#8.6

name: 袖与手
content: 当我第一次接触到自然的草木时，我就知道我的生命属于它们。#0
encontent: When I first saw trees and grass, I knew my life belonged to them.#0

name: 衣着与身形
content: 礼服与鞋跟不会阻挡我的步伐，#0|我能在林间跳跃，因为我曾经无数次地这么做过。#3.1
encontent: Gowns and heels will not stop me.#0| I will jump into the woods, as I have done this countless times.#2.7

name: 嗜好
content: 在林中独处是一种享受。#0|从旦通宵，以夜继昼，于我而言只是一瞬而已。#3.2
encontent: It is a pleasure to be alone in the forest.#0| In a flash, cards of days and nights are shuffled. #2.5

name: 赞赏
content: 你的优秀证实了我的眼光。#0
encontent: Your excellence proves my insight. #0

name: 亲昵
content: 我不擅长逢迎交际，也难以理解暧昧的真意。#0|这样是一种欠缺吗？#6.9
encontent: I am not good at socializing with others, nor do I understand the truth behind ambiguity.#0| Is that a loss?#6.2

name: 闲谈Ⅰ
content: 对于植物来说，大地上已再无新鲜事。#0|它们无眼亦无耳却知晓一切，而我会倾听它们的故事。#5.5
encontent: There is nothing new for trees and grass.#0|With no eyesight, nor hearing, they know it all. And I will lend an ear to their whispers. #3.8

name: 闲谈Ⅱ
content: 待我的凯尔特麦酒收获时，希望各位都能赏光一试。#0
encontent: After I brew my Celtic ale, I hope everyone will appreciate it.#0

name: 独白

encontent: Revenge is only the self-comfort of those who are drowning in the past,#0| while I choose to look ahead. #4.4

name: 洞悉之底
content: 从此往后，我能看见与理解得更多。#0|您帮助了我，我会给予您适当的回报。#5
encontent: From now on, I will see and understand more.#0| You helped me, and I will give you an appropriate return.#3.6

content: 只要看过一次我的飞行就不会忘记我的名字。#0|我是红弩箭，换而言之，我是你的胜利女神。#3.5

content: 某人只是一介不知名的流浪骑士。#0|蒙您收留，如不嫌弃，请让某人为您效劳至最后一刻。#4.2

name: 信任-朝晨

name: 夜暮
content: 您担心熬夜会秃头吗？#0|某人这里有来自主君的古老秘方……#2|噢，请不要翻看他孙子的画像。#5|某人相信两者之间没有必然联系。#8.7

name: 信任-夜暮

name: 衣着与身形

encontent: ... Sometimes I think that you may need to have more rest. #0|People with great responsibility are always absorbed by their work #3.5 | and neglect many other things.#7.2

content: “个子很小，想得却很多”，#0|许多人都这么说我，可我觉得他们麻木。#3.6|热爱工作或许不是坏事，但热爱生活难道不是好事吗？#8.8
encontent: A small lad with a lot of thoughts.#0| That's what many people think about me. But I think they're numb. #2.5|It may not be a bad thing to love your job, but isn't it a good thing to love your life?#8

name: 嗜好

name: 赞赏

name: 闲谈Ⅱ

In a parterre or in a garden?#0| Neither, my friend, you should go under the bridge where even a tramp will find it too dirty to spend a night. #6.2|Only on the mud-coatted walls of the aperture can you see the most beautiful cornflowers' ... graffiti.#13

name: 亲昵
content: 让人流血者终将鲜血流淌，创造不公者终将被公义造访。#0|我见过许多手握权力的正直者终究沉沦于权力。#10.4|当我面临那一天时，请你不要心慈手软。#17

name: 嗜好
content: 新世界的曙光将刺破夜幕，想象力正在夺权。#0|我们将重新发明这个世界，为了那一天，我还将不停奋进，奋进！奋进！#5.1
encontent: The dawn of the new world is about to pierce the night, the power of imagination is taking over. #0|We will reinvent the world; and for that day to come, I shall march, march, and march!#6.7

name: 赞赏
content: 噢，我看到了。#0|尽管你总是板着脸，但你身上也有叛逆的火光。#3
encontent: Oh, I can see it on you. #0|Though you always keep that stern look on your face, I see the sparkles of rebellion.#2.7

name: 亲昵
content: 我亲爱、亲爱的朋友，你能把这些烟花先拿到大本钟那去吗？#0|别担心，我带上这些拉炮就来……#5.8
encontent: My dear, dear friend, can you take these fireworks to the Big Ben first?#0| Don't worry, I will be with you shortly after getting these crackers ...#5.5

name: 闲谈Ⅰ
content: 世人已经被蒙蔽了太久！#0|他们屈从于庸俗的现状，而我将用美梦带他们重返生命的真实。#2.7|不行，这个太小了。#12.3
encontent: The vision of men and women has been blinded for too long! #0|They succumbed to the vulgar circumstances, and I will bring them back into the arms of life with dreams.#4.1| No no, this one is too small.#12.7

name: 闲谈Ⅱ
content: 当你走在伦敦的街上，你得留神，得小心那些紧抿着嘴，戴着帽子，总是面无表情的人。#0|他们古板，缺少想象力，不具有高智商与审……#8.3|哦，无意冒犯。#12.7
encontent: When you walk on the streets in London, be careful of those lip-pressing, hat-wearing, emotionless passers-by. #0|They are stuffy, stupid, lack of imagination and aesthet- ...#6.5|  Oops, no offence.#10.8

name: 独白
content: “在此驻足吧：看这崭新的坟茔……#0|去寻求荫蔽，摆脱茔地的昏暗，摆脱人世以外的苦风。#5.6|阿多尼斯已然逝去，我们何须惶恐？”#13.8|……白蝴蝶飞舞在草坪上，这情境如此罕见。#20.3
encontent: Here pause: these graves are all too young as yet ... #0|From the world's bitter wind Seek shelter in the shadow of the tomb.#6.8|What Adonais is, why fear we to become?#13|... Here witness: the white butterfly on the lawn, What a rare view we stumbled upon.#18.4

name: 入队
content: 噢，太棒了！让我们不假思索地上路吧。#0
encontent: Oh, this is groovy! Let's get on the road.#0

name: 战前
content: 空前绝后！#0
encontent: Well, this is outtasight.#0

name: 择选咒语Ⅰ
content: 来吧，来吧。#0
encontent: Come, come. #0

name: 择选咒语Ⅱ
content: 嘿，嘿！艺术家在这呢！#0
encontent: Hey, HEY! The artist's here!#0

name: 择选高阶咒语
content: 我的经典之作！#0
encontent: This is classic!#0

name: 择选至终的仪式
content: 向美好的愿景致礼。#0
encontent: Salute to a better tomorrow.#0

name: 释放神秘术Ⅰ
content: 勇气的鸣响！#0
encontent: The resonance of bravery!#0

name: 释放神秘术Ⅰ
content: 你的道路是什么，老兄？#0
encontent: What is the road you have taken, my man?#0

name: 释放神秘术Ⅱ
content: 竖起耳朵，朋友。#0
encontent: Listen, my friend.#0

name: 释放神秘术Ⅱ
content: 瞧，多活泼的孩子们。#0
encontent: Look at these little fellas!#0

name: 召唤至终的仪式
content: 泡影如镜，朋友。#0
encontent: Bubbles reflect like mirrors, my friend.#0

name: 受敌Ⅰ
encontent: Whaaa!#0

name: 受敌Ⅱ
content: 可耻的暴力……！#0
encontent: Shame on violence ...!#0

name: 战斗胜利
content: 当然了，和平需要主动争取。#0
encontent: Of course, peace needs to be made to happen.#0

name: 洞悉
content: 我听到了，缪斯女神的启示……#0
encontent: I hear it—the revelation of Muse ...#0

name: 洞悉之底
content: 阳光灿烂的日子。#0|曾有过这样的日子，以后也还会有。#2.4
encontent: A bright summer day. #0|We once had days like this, and we will have more in the future.#2.4
